FixThisBuildThat.com ‚ñ™Ô∏è Woodworking & DIY Projects and Plans ‚ñ™Ô∏è Nashville, TN ‚ñ™Ô∏è fixthisbuildthat@gmail.com üëá My shop & furniture build plans! üëá

posts.description:
Alright, fess up. Who else lets the glue dry in their silicone brush just so they can pick it out? üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
#picker #fixthisbuildthat

After several back and forths I'm pretty happy with this shade of gray we went with for the base. It's called Cathedral Gray by Behr as recommended by @shelbbygaaail via DM. It helps to have followers who work at the paint desk at @homedepot!
#grayallday #fixthisbuildthat

It's #slaburday and this salvaged  redwood slab from @hunskihardwoods has a secret. Can you spot it?
#mirrormirroronthewall #woodporn #fixthisbuildthat

You have a tape measure, but do you have a hand engraved tape measure? Of course you don't, because you aren't today's #ff @jbowerengraving. I've just recently found Jenny's account and I'm just blown away by her work. Her videos are so mesmerizing to watch and the different pieces she engraves are absolutely beautiful. I love having some non-woodworking accounts like this in my feed that just give me tons of design and creative inspiration. Go give her a follow if you want some beautiful engraving in your feed!
#followfriday #fixthisbuildthat

If you missed it on my Story, today I had a blast doing volunteer work with @homedepot down in Atlanta. A group of us built 55 of these dressers to help a local service group.  It was so fun to see the power of many hands. I basically sat back eating donuts while @whitneyatwork and @sarahayang did all the work. I love being able to put my time and skills to use helping others. It was an awesome event and I encourage you to get engaged in your community if you want to give back! üì∑: @bowerpowerblog
#giveback #THDProSpective #fixthisbuildthat

I'm down in Atlanta for the @homedepot ProSpective tool event and check out what I spotted in the wild. The new 6 and 9Ah batteries from @ridgidpowertools. And yes, that is a Bluetooth symbol on them. You can sync to your phone and do some pretty cool things with it like get notifications, time remaining to charge, or even lock the batteries from use based on time or proximity.  Cool tech!
#teamRIDGID #fixthisbuildthat

The top turned out amazing! I hit it will 2 coats of water based poly and the sheen is just what I was looking for. It looks a little more matte in this pic, but it has a nice satin sheen.  And how sweet does that knot look?
#knotty #fixthisbuildthat

How slick is this honeycomb cutting board from @lumbertown_woodworks? Love seeing new designs and innovation and I definitely love the walnut and yellowheart combo! 
#buzzbuzz #fixthisbuildthat

Cut the top to size after the glue up. I was just able to get through it with a standard 7-1/4" blade. You can see some of the tearout at the bottom where I just missed going through due to unevenness of the boards. This top is THICK!
#withathickness #fixthisbuildthat

Over 6' long boards of reclaimed douglas fir going into the glue up for this top! That was quite the glue up considering my worktop is 4'. Had to add auxiliary support just to get this thing done!  I really need to get on building that assembly table üò©
#glueups #fixthisbuildthat

Love seeing this douglas fir come to life from under the 70 years of grit. But don't worry, I'm leaving the top as gritty as it wants to be. This is the underside and I need it flat and smooth.
#gritty #fixthisbuildthat

Plugging holes and cutting em flush. If you watched my 6 ways to fill pocket holes video then you know this is my preferred method. If you haven't seen it then go check it out on my site, I put a link in my bio ‚òùÔ∏è.
#plugemup #fixthisbuildthat

I'm really liking where this is going! And no, these aren't X's. 
#alltheangles #fixthisbuildthat

I thought I ordered the long slab?  Nothing like a 32' long slab from @fromcheftotable to kickoff your #slaburday. Make it a good one! 
#woodporn #fixthisbuildthat

This way to the weekend. I'll be finishing up this build with some fun architectural accents.  Are you making anything fun this weekend?
#itsthefreakinweekend #fixthisbuildthat

Although it's not for the @modernmakerpodcast 2x4 challenge, I'm going straight dimensional lumber on this base! 4x4s and 2x4s, oh my! Okay, so I ripped the rounded corners off the 2x4s...I just couldn't take it looking that much like a wall stud üòÉ
#2x4ftw #fixthisbuildthat

Whenever I'm feeling overwhelmed in the shop or if a project is giving me a hard time, I just look at photo like this and think to myself..."Shut up you wuss. 2 Austrian dudes are turning 15 foot bowls on a tractor and you can't figure this out?". Helps put things in perspective üòÉ

Peter Andres and Werner Rumplmayr pictured via @carterandsontoolworks feed. 
#perspective #hugebowls #fixthisbuildthat
